title: Reactivity of phenoxathiin-based thiacalixarenes towards C-nucleophiles
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13463-13473
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02524E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Kamil Mamleev, Jan Čejka, Václav Eigner, Martin Krupička, Hana Dvořáková, Pavel Lhoták
Phenoxathiin-based macrocycles react with RLi reagents to form a number of different products resulting from cleavage of the calixarene backbone or heterocyclic group.
